text: Alain Rey (; – )“Alain Rey, l’un des maîtres d’œuvre du dictionnaire Le Robert, est mort”, LeMonde.fr. was a French linguist, lexicographer and radio personality. He was the editor-in-chief at French dictionary publisher Dictionnaires Le Robert from 1967 until his death. Rey was born in Pont-du- Château, France. Rey died on 28 October 2020 in Paris at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Writers from Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes Category:French radio personalities Category:French linguists Category:French editors Category:People from Puy-de-Dôme
title: Alain Rey
